channel.title: Omg! help!
channel.description: Can't log on my server. I checked the character folder and found a username that was _ When I try log in it logs but stuckes and then connection lost! Everytime I try log in same thing happens!.!

item.title: Omg! help!
item.dc:creator: @xx_pk3r_xx xx pk3r xx
item.description:
@xx_pk3r_xx wrote:

[quote=“lacose, post:7, topic:218702”]Delete the file anways… you shouldnt have a __ file name anyhow it confuses alot of things.

Just delete it make a new file and do this to get admin.

Say you name ur file Xbox create the file log out then go to your charactor folder. and find your name so it would be,

[code][ACCOUNT]
character-username = Xbox
character-password = eb787079d5441f4f44cf3598a39e65d5

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-started = 1
character-posx = 2513
character-posy = 3861
character-rights = 0
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = ip70-180-68-232.no.no.cox.net
character-lastlogin = 20080609
character-energy = 100
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 499
character-ancients = 1
character-rating = 1500

[EQUIPMENT]
character-equip = 0 -1 0
character-equip = 1 -1 0
character-equip = 2 -1 0
character-equip = 3 1291 1
character-equip = 4 -1 0
character-equip = 5 1171 1
character-equip = 6 -1 0
character-equip = 7 -1 0
character-equip = 8 -1 0
character-equip = 9 -1 0
character-equip = 10 -1 0
character-equip = 11 -1 0
character-equip = 12 -1 0
character-equip = 13 -1 0

[LOOK]
character-look = 0 0
character-look = 1 3
character-look = 2 14
character-look = 3 21
character-look = 4 27
character-look = 5 33
character-look = 6 38
character-look = 7 42
character-look = 8 3
character-look = 9 5
character-look = 10 6
character-look = 11 2
character-look = 12 1
character-look = 13 0
character-look = 14 3
character-look = 15 5
character-look = 16 6
character-look = 17 2
character-look = 18 1

[SKILLS]
character-skill = 0 1 0
character-skill = 1 1 0
character-skill = 2 1 0
character-skill = 3 10 1155
character-skill = 4 1 0
character-skill = 5 1 0
character-skill = 6 1 0
character-skill = 7 1 0
character-skill = 8 1 0
character-skill = 9 1 0
character-skill = 10 1 0
character-skill = 11 1 0
character-skill = 12 1 0
character-skill = 13 1 0
character-skill = 14 1 0
character-skill = 15 1 0
character-skill = 16 1 0
character-skill = 17 1 0
character-skill = 18 1 0
character-skill = 19 1 0
character-skill = 20 1 0
character-skill = 21 1 0
character-skill = 22 1 0
character-skill = 23 1 0
character-skill = 24 30 0

[ITEMS]
character-item = 2 2529 1

[BANK]

[FRIENDS]

[IGNORES]

[EOF]

[/code]

Now where it says character-rights = 0change the 0 to either 1 = mod 2 = admin 3 = owner.

Then save and log back in.

Be advised you have to be logged out of the account your editing when you save the file so it will read it.[/quote]
well that dosent rlly cause he cant even get on ffs…

Read full topic

item.title: Omg! help!
item.dc:creator: @lacose lacose
item.description:
@lacose wrote:

Delete the file anways… you shouldnt have a __ file name anyhow it confuses alot of things.

Just delete it make a new file and do this to get admin.

Say you name ur file Xbox create the file log out then go to your charactor folder. and find your name so it would be,

[code][ACCOUNT]
character-username = Xbox
character-password = eb787079d5441f4f44cf3598a39e65d5

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-started = 1
character-posx = 2513
character-posy = 3861
character-rights = 0
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = ip70-180-68-232.no.no.cox.net
character-lastlogin = 20080609
character-energy = 100
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 499
character-ancients = 1
character-rating = 1500

[EQUIPMENT]
character-equip = 0 -1 0
character-equip = 1 -1 0
character-equip = 2 -1 0
character-equip = 3 1291 1
character-equip = 4 -1 0
character-equip = 5 1171 1
character-equip = 6 -1 0
character-equip = 7 -1 0
character-equip = 8 -1 0
character-equip = 9 -1 0
character-equip = 10 -1 0
character-equip = 11 -1 0
character-equip = 12 -1 0
character-equip = 13 -1 0

[LOOK]
character-look = 0 0
character-look = 1 3
character-look = 2 14
character-look = 3 21
character-look = 4 27
character-look = 5 33
character-look = 6 38
character-look = 7 42
character-look = 8 3
character-look = 9 5
character-look = 10 6
character-look = 11 2
character-look = 12 1
character-look = 13 0
character-look = 14 3
character-look = 15 5
character-look = 16 6
character-look = 17 2
character-look = 18 1

[SKILLS]
character-skill = 0 1 0
character-skill = 1 1 0
character-skill = 2 1 0
character-skill = 3 10 1155
character-skill = 4 1 0
character-skill = 5 1 0
character-skill = 6 1 0
character-skill = 7 1 0
character-skill = 8 1 0
character-skill = 9 1 0
character-skill = 10 1 0
character-skill = 11 1 0
character-skill = 12 1 0
character-skill = 13 1 0
character-skill = 14 1 0
character-skill = 15 1 0
character-skill = 16 1 0
character-skill = 17 1 0
character-skill = 18 1 0
character-skill = 19 1 0
character-skill = 20 1 0
character-skill = 21 1 0
character-skill = 22 1 0
character-skill = 23 1 0
character-skill = 24 30 0

[ITEMS]
character-item = 2 2529 1

[BANK]

[FRIENDS]

[IGNORES]

[EOF]

[/code]

Now where it says character-rights = 0change the 0 to either 1 = mod 2 = admin 3 = owner.

Then save and log back in.

Be advised you have to be logged out of the account your editing when you save the file so it will read it.

Read full topic

item.title: Omg! help!

Btw I’m using client.silabsoft.org[/quote]

item.title: Omg! help!
item.dc:creator: @lacose lacose
item.description:
@lacose wrote:

Ok well this is a basic question but try these.

  1. Get a diffirent client you could be using an outdated client and its not reading the items.
  2. Try deleting your moreinfo and charactor file then doing it over.

Hope that works

Read full topic
